`,(0,a.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,a.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-css",children:`[contentlayer.config.js]

import { defineDocumentType, makeSource } from "contentlayer/source-files";

const Post = defineDocumentType(() => ({
  name: "Post",
  filePathPattern: \`**/*.md\`,
  contentType: "markdown",
  fields: {
    title: { type: "string", required: true },
    date: { type: "string", required: true },
  },
  computedFields: {
    slug: {
      type: "string",
      resolve: (doc) => doc._raw.sourceFileName.replace(/\\.md/, ""),
    },
  },
}));

export default makeSource({
  contentDirPath: "posts",
  documentTypes: [Post],
});

`,(0,a.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,a.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-css",children:`[posts/pre-rendering.md]
---
title: "Two Forms of Pre-rendering"
date: "2020-01-01"
---

Next.js has two forms of pre-rendering: **Static Generation** and **Server-side Rendering**. The difference is in **when** it generates the HTML for a page.

- **Static Generation** is the pre-rendering method that generates the HTML at **build time**. The pre-rendered HTML is then _reused_ on each request.
- **Server-side Rendering** is the pre-rendering method that generates the HTML on **each request**.

Importantly, Next.js lets you **choose** which pre-rendering form to use for each page. You can create a "hybrid" Next.js app by using Static Generation for most pages and using Server-side Rendering for others.
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/aeong/gitblog/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-3fe3454d-2bc8-48a7-ad1d-a111a8a6c449.mdx",lineNumber:130,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/aeong/gitblog/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-3fe3454d-2bc8-48a7-ad1d-a111a8a6c449.mdx",lineNumber:130,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,a.jsxDEV)(n.h2,{children:"\uAC8C\uC2DC\uBB3C Fetch & display \uD558\uAE30"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/aeong/gitblog/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-3fe3454d-2bc8-48a7-ad1d-a111a8a6c449.mdx",lineNumber:147,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,a.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,a.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-css",children:`[pages/index.js]
import Link from "next/link";
import { allPosts } from "contentlayer/generated";
import { pick } from "@contentlayer/client";

export default function Home({ posts }) {
  return (
    <section>
      <ul>
        {posts.map(({ slug, date, title }) => (
          <li key={slug}>
            <Link href={\`/posts/\${slug}\`}>
              <a>{title}</a>
            </Link>
            <br />
            <small>{date}</small>
          </li>
        ))}
      </ul>
    </section>
  );
}

// Statically fetch all posts
export async function getStaticProps() {
  const posts = allPosts.map((post) => pick(post, ["title", "date", "slug"]));

  return { props: { posts } };
}

`,(0,a.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,a.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-css",children:`[pages/posts/[slug].js]

import { allPosts } from 'contentlayer/generated'

export default function Post({ post }) {
  return (
    <article>
      <h1>{post.title}</h1>
      <div>{post.date}</div>

      <div dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: post.body.html }} />
    </article>
  )
}

export async function getStaticPaths() {
  return {
    paths: allPosts.map((p) => ({ params: { slug: p.slug } })),
    fallback: false,
  }
}

// Statically fetch post by slug
export async function getStaticProps({ params }) {
  const post = allPosts.find((post) => post.slug === params?.slug)

  return { props: { post } }
}

<TouchableHighlight

</TouchableHighlight>;

title: ssh connect to host github.com port 22 Operation timed out[ì˜¤ë¥˜í•´ê²°]

body.raw:
### 1. í„°ë¯¸ë„ì—

`sudo nano ~/.ssh/config`

ë¥¼ ì…ë ¥í•œë‹¤

### 2. password ë¥¼ ì…ë ¥í•œë‹¤.

```jsx
Host github.com
 Hostname ssh.github.com
 Port 443

```

![hose.png](/40/hose.png)

ìœ„ì™€ ê°™ì´ ì…ë ¥ í•œë‹¤.

### 3. ctr + X ë¥¼ ì…ë ¥í•´ ì°½ì„ ë¹ ì ¸ë‚˜ê°„ë‹¤.

### 4. ì•„ë˜ì™€ ê°™ì€ ì°½ì´ ë³´ì´ë©´ Y ë¥¼ ëˆŒëŸ¬ saveë¥¼ í•˜ê³  ë¹ ì ¸ë‚˜ì˜¨ë‹¤.

![save.png](/40/save.png)

### 5. `ssh -T git@github.com` ëŠ”

[SSHë¥¼ í†µí•œ GitHub ì—°ê²° - GitHub Docs](https://docs.github.com/ko/authentication/connecting-to-github-with-ssh)

ssh ë¥¼ í†µí•œ ê¹ƒí—ˆë¸Œê°€ ì˜ ì—°ê²°ë˜ì—ˆë‹¤ëŠ” í™•ì¸ì„ ìœ„í•œ ëª…ë ¹ì–´ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤.

- git push ì•ˆë˜ëŠ” ì˜¤ë¥˜ í•´ê²°

[ssh: connect to host github.com port 22: Connection timed out](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/15589682/ssh-connect-to-host-github-com-port-22-connection-timed-out)

<aside>
ğŸ’¡ For my case none of the suggested solutions worked so I tried to fix it myself and I got it resolved.

For me I am getting this error on my AWS EC2 UBUNTU instance, what I did to resolve it was to edit the ssh config (or add it if it does not exist).

`sudo nano ~/.ssh/config`

And I added the following

```
Host github.com
 Hostname ssh.github.com
 Port 443

```

Then, run the commandÂ `ssh -T git@github.com`Â to confirm if the issue is fixed.

According toÂ [this](https://help.github.com/articles/using-ssh-over-the-https-port/)

> Sometimes, firewalls refuse to allow SSH connections entirely. If using HTTPS cloning with credential caching is not an option, you can attempt to clone using an SSH connection made over the HTTPS port. Most firewall rules should allow this, but proxy servers may interfere

Hopefully this helps anyone else who's having the same issue I did.

</aside>

| ------------- | ------------------------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --- |
| \uC6F9            | ASP.NET Core                         | \uC11C\uBC84 \uCABD \uB17C\uB9AC\uB97C \uBE4C\uB4DC\uD558\uAE30 \uC704\uD55C \uD504\uB808\uC784\uC6CC\uD06C\uC785\uB2C8\uB2E4.                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| \uC6F9            | ASP.NET Core MVC                     | \uC6F9 \uD398\uC774\uC9C0 \uB610\uB294 \uC6F9 API\uC758 \uC11C\uBC84 \uCABD \uB17C\uB9AC\uB97C \uBE4C\uB4DC\uD558\uAE30 \uC704\uD55C \uD504\uB808\uC784\uC6CC\uD06C\uC785\uB2C8\uB2E4.                                                                                                                                                                         |
| \uC6F9            | ASP.NET Core Razor Pages             | \uC11C\uBC84\uC5D0\uC11C \uC0DD\uC131\uB41C HTML\uC744 \uBE4C\uB4DC\uD558\uAE30 \uC704\uD55C \uD504\uB808\uC784\uC6CC\uD06C\uC785\uB2C8\uB2E4.                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| \uC6F9 \uD074\uB77C\uC774\uC5B8\uD2B8 | Blazor                               | Blazor\uB294 ASP.NET Core\uC758 \uC77C\uBD80\uC785\uB2C8\uB2E4. \uB450 \uAC00\uC9C0 \uBAA8\uB4DC\uB97C \uD1B5\uD574 \uC11C\uBC84 \uCABD \uCF54\uB4DC\uB97C \uC2E4\uD589\uD558\uAE30 \uC704\uD55C \uD1B5\uC2E0 \uC218\uB2E8\uC73C\uB85C \uC18C\uCF13\uC744 \uD65C\uC6A9\uD558\uC5EC DOM(\uBB38\uC11C \uAC1C\uCCB4 \uBAA8\uB378)\uC744 \uC870\uC791\uD558\uAC70\uB098 \uCEF4\uD30C\uC77C\uB41C C#\uC744 \uBE0C\uB77C\uC6B0\uC800\uC5D0\uC11C \uC2E4\uD589\uD558\uAE30 \uC704\uD55C WebAssembly \uAD6C\uD604\uC73C\uB85C \uD65C\uC6A9\uD558\uC5EC \uC870\uC791\uD560 \uC218 \uC788\uC2B5\uB2C8\uB2E4. |
| \uBC14\uD0D5 \uD654\uBA74     | WinForms                             | \u201C\uBC30\uD2C0\uC2ED \uADF8\uB808\uC774\u201D Windows \uC2A4\uD0C0\uC77C \uC560\uD50C\uB9AC\uCF00\uC774\uC158\uC744 \uBE4C\uB4DC\uD558\uAE30 \uC704\uD55C \uD504\uB808\uC784\uC6CC\uD06C\uC785\uB2C8\uB2E4.                                                                                                                                                                  |
| \uBC14\uD0D5 \uD654\uBA74     | WPF(Windows Presentation Foundation) | \uB2E4\uC591\uD55C \uD3FC \uD329\uD130\uB97C \uB530\uB974\uB294 \uB3D9\uC801 \uB370\uC2A4\uD06C\uD1B1 \uC560\uD50C\uB9AC\uCF00\uC774\uC158\uC744 \uAD6C\uCD95\uD558\uB294 \uD504\uB808\uC784\uC6CC\uD06C\uC785\uB2C8\uB2E4. WPF\uB97C \uC0AC\uC6A9\uD558\uBA74 \uD3FC \uC694\uC18C\uAC00 \uB2E4\uC591\uD55C \uC560\uB2C8\uBA54\uC774\uC158 \uB77C\uC774\uBE0C\uB7EC\uB9AC\uC758 \uB3C4\uC6C0\uC744 \uBC1B\uC544 \uC6C0\uC9C1\uC784, \uD398\uC774\uB4DC, \uAE00\uB77C\uC774\uB4DC \uB4F1 \uAE30\uD0C0 \uD6A8\uACFC\uB97C \uC218\uD589\uD560 \uC218 \uC788\uC2B5\uB2C8\uB2E4.                                |
| \uD734\uB300\uD3F0        | Xamarin                              | .NET \uAC1C\uBC1C\uC790\uAC00 iOS \uBC0F Android \uB514\uBC14\uC774\uC2A4\uC6A9 \uC571\uC744 \uBE4C\uB4DC\uD560 \uC218 \uC788\uC2B5\uB2C8\uB2E4.                                                                                                                                                                               |     |`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/aeong/gitblog/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-287bd706-4ff6-4f9d-bd1b-c21c8e157300.mdx",lineNumber:19,columnNumber:1},this),`
